assignReviewerToPaper(uint256).details: assignReviewerToPaper - This function assign the caller to the paper as a reviewer. This function will only be called by the reviewer contract.

constructor.details: the constructor simply gets the author contract address and store it in the authors contract object.      this address is later used for initializing the author contract.

params._authorContractAddress: must be the existing deployed Author contract address

getAllLatestPapersIds().details: getAllLatestPapersIds - This function returns only the latest paper ids.
getAllLatestPapersIds().return: uint[] paperids  the array of latest paper ids.

getAllPapersIds().details: getAllPapersIds - This function returns all the stored paper ids regardless their status
getAllPapersIds().return: uint[] paperids  the array of latest paper ids.

getLatestId().details: getLatestId - This function  only returns the number of papers on the paper contract
getLatestId().return: uint  returns the total stored papers

getPaperKeyword(uint256,uint256).details: getPaperKeyword - This function returns the keyword value

params.keywordIndex: the index of the keyword you are looking for(Make sure index exist)

getPaperValues(uint256).details: getPaperValues - This function returns the paper attributes associated with its paper id
getPaperValues(uint256).return: string _title the title of the paperstring _ipfs  ipfs based file hash CIDaddress author  author address of the associated paperPaperStatus status the status of the paperaddress[]  reviewers the array of reviewer addressesbytes32[]  keywords  the keywords attached to the paperuint     version    the current paper version

getVersionHistory(uint256,uint256).details: getVersionHistory - This function returns the author's old paper ipfs hash cid and its status.
getVersionHistory(uint256,uint256).return: string _ipfs  ipfs based file hash CIDPaperStatus status the status of the paper

isPaperExist(uint256).details: isPaperExist - This function verify if the paper id exist in the paper contract or not.
isPaperExist(uint256).return: bool          returns true if paper id exist otherwise false.

isReviewerAlreadyAssigned(uint256).details: isReviewerAlreadyAssigned - Verify if the caller who wants to get assigned on this paper is already assigned on this paper. Otherwise return false.
isReviewerAlreadyAssigned(uint256).return: bool          returns true if the reviewer is already assigned on this paper id otherwise false.

setPaperStatusByReviewer(uint256,uint8).details: setPaperStatusByReviewer - This function allows the reviewer to set the new status for the paper associated with paper id by the reviewer contract.

params._status: the new status to be set for the paper

uploadModifiedPaper(uint32,string,string.details: uploadModifiedPaper - This function takes new information and stored against the existing paperid then it stores them by associating it with the new paper id.

params._ipfs: newly added ipfs based file hash CID
params._keywords: string keywords for the paper in bytes32

uploadNewPaper(string,string,bytes32[],s.details: uploadNewPaper - This function adds a new paper information by taking all the paper related information                        from the caller. then it stores them by associating it with the new paper id.

params._ipfs: newly added ipfs based file hash CID
params._keywords: string keywords for the paper in bytes32
